name: CactusSoft
tag_list: outsourcing, software-development, application-development, iphone-applications, ios-development, android, windows-phone, web-services, web-development, -net-development, outstaffing
overview:
CactusSoft is an international software service company, with the offices in Belarus and Denmark.

CactusSoft specializes in nearshore software development with a focus on:

  • Mobile solutions / Embedded solutions
  • Custom solutions based on .NET technology
  • Digital cross-platform solutions

CactusSoft’s services cover the complete software product life cycle, from concept creation and UI design, to software development, testing, integration and maintenance. In 5 years CactusSoft’s team grew up to 80 engineers, and the majority of them are senior software developers.

CactusSoft works for business across Europe, North America and Russia, among their clients there are well-known companies (Nokia, Danish Broadcasting Corporation, Leo Burnett, Yandex), as well as promising startups (Pruffi, OurHomeSpaces, Nodes).
